title: Reddit
cleaned_text: China I've used watermelon powder for canker sores, it seems to work and quickly. Ive been fed bitter black soup for a cold/sore throat, don't know if it helped. I've done cupping, my back got better after but don't know if it helped as it had already been 2-3 days of pain. I had a chinese friend from Cambodia who was addicted to eating birds nest soup every morning (said it is better than coffee) that's an expensive habit! Just wondering for those in china or connected to china/Chinese culture, What are your good or bad experiences with TCM? Has anything from Chinese medicine become your habit or
